```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
df <- data.frame(A = 1:5)
df_tmp <- matrix(NA, ncol = 3, nrow = 5) %>%
    as.data.frame() %>%
    `names<-`(paste0(c('a', 'b', 'd'), "_score"))

df_bind <- bind_cols(df, df_tmp)

for (i in c('a', 'b', 'd')) {
    df_bind[, paste0(c('a', 'b', 'd'), "_score")] <- df$A
    
}

df_bind
```
